Welcome to surface_plot’s documentation!¶

Surface Plot is a python libray to plot cortical surface data from CFIN

Check out the Usage section for further information, including Installation of the project.

Note

This project is under active development. Any questions can be sent to lasse.madsen@clin.au.dk
